sentence.text: Overall, our findings establish small GTPase mediated signal transduction as a tumor-suppressive hub in MM and provide a mechanistic rationale for combining trametinib with HDAC inhibitors or bortezomib to treat patients with tumors exhibiting low RASSF4 expression.Significance: These findings provide a mechanistic rationale for combining trametinib with HDAC inhibitors or bortezomib in patients with multiple myeloma whose tumors exhibit low RASSF4 expression.
